1: Leaders rejoice in divine strength and deliverance.
2: Heartfelt desires are granted, and spoken requests are answered.
3: Blessings arrive first, then a crown of pure gold.
4: Ask for life, receive long, enduring days.
5: Rescue brings great glory; honor and majesty follow.
6: Gracious presence bestows lasting blessing and abundant joy.
7: Trust in the Highest brings enduring stability through compassionate care.
8: Steadfast strength reveals all opposition and secures peace.
9: Justice protects the community and preserves lasting peace.
10: Justice clears the way for flourishing generations on earth.
11: Steadfast protection overcomes every plot and preserves peace
12: Steady preparation makes opposition retreat and secures lasting peace.
13: I celebrate empowering strength through joyful song.
